content.html:
QCOMPARE gives better feedback when the test fails:

diff -r 59ffbe60b8eb test/integration/collada_visualization.cc
--- a/test/integration/collada_visualization.cc Wed Aug 17 14:11:42 2016 -0700
+++ b/test/integration/collada_visualization.cc Wed Aug 17 14:42:57 2016 -0700
@@ -44,7 +44,7 @@
   this->ProcessEventsAndDraw(mainWindow);

   // There should be two triangles.
-  QVERIFY(cam->TriangleCount() == 2);
+  QCOMPARE(cam->TriangleCount(), 2u);

   mainWindow->close();
   delete mainWindow;
